code: import React,{useState}from'react';import dictionary from'../chapters/dictionary';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Dictionary=_ref=>{let{language}=_ref;const[term,setTerm]=useState('');const[definition,setDefinition]=useState('');const handleSearch=()=>{const termDefinition=dictionary[language][term];setDefinition(termDefinition?termDefinition:language==='ru'?'Термин не найден.':'Term not found.');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:language==='ru'?'Словарь':'Dictionary'}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:term,onChange:e=>setTerm(e.target.value),placeholder:language==='ru'?'Введите термин':'Enter term'}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleSearch,children:language==='ru'?'Найти':'Search'}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:definition})]});};export default Dictionary;
